summary: This bill, the South Pacific Tuna Treaty Act of 2025, amends the South Pacific Tuna Act of 1988. It modifies definitions related to fishing and licensing areas, updates prohibited acts, adjusts criminal offenses and civil penalties, and revises enforcement procedures. The bill also addresses observer programs, technical assistance, arbitration, disposition of funds, and authorization of appropriations related to the tuna treaty. It aims to streamline and update the existing regulations governing tuna fishing in the South Pacific, aligning them with international agreements and improving enforcement.
